question_text:
Choose the correct answer 

Statements:

No Watch is Cycle.

No Cycle is Motorbike.

Some Autos are Motorbike.



Conclusion:

I. No Motorbike is Watch.

II. No Motorbike is Cycle.

III. Some Cycles are Watches.

IV. All Motorbikes are Watches.



Choices:

1- None follow

2- Only I follows

3- Only I and III follow

4- None of these
